objenome.solver.evolve.event.stat

Class AbstractStat<T extends Event>

  • java.lang.Object
    • objenome.solver.evolve.event.stat.AbstractStat<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GPContainer.GPContainerAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElitismDuration, ElitismElites, ElitismEndTime, ElitismStartTime, GenerationAverageDepth, GenerationAverageDepthError, GenerationAverageDoubleFitness, GenerationAverageDoubleFitnessError, GenerationAverageLength, GenerationAverageLengthError, GenerationAverageNodesPerDepth, GenerationAverageNonTerminals, GenerationAverageNonTerminalsError, GenerationAverageTerminals, GenerationAverageTerminalsError, GenerationBestFitness, GenerationBestIndividuals, GenerationDepths, GenerationDuration, GenerationEndTime, GenerationFitnessDiversity, GenerationFitnesses, GenerationLengths, GenerationMaximumDepth, GenerationMaximumLength, GenerationMaximumNonTerminals, GenerationMaximumTerminals, GenerationMedianFitness, GenerationMinimumDepth, GenerationMinimumLength, GenerationMinimumNonTerminals, GenerationMinimumTerminals, GenerationNonTerminals, GenerationNumber, GenerationPopulation, GenerationStandardDeviationDepth, GenerationStandardDeviationDoubleFitness, GenerationStandardDeviationLength, GenerationStandardDeviationNonTerminals, GenerationStandardDeviationTerminals, GenerationStartTime, GenerationTerminals, GenerationWorstFitness, OperatorDuration, OperatorEndTime, OperatorStartTime, RunBestFitness, RunBestIndividuals, RunDuration, RunEndTime, RunStartTime

    public abstract class AbstractStat<T extends Event>
extends java.lang.Object
implements GPContainer.GPContainerAware
    The AbstractStat represent the base class for classes that gathers data and statistics about events. It also works as a central repository for registering, removing and retrieving stat objects.
    See Also:
    Event

      • listener

        public Listener<T extends Event> listener
        This is the stat listener. When the stat is registered, its listener is added to the EventManager.
